answerOne: Deal4Deal is  a stationery and garment store with a twist. For every purchase made, Deal4Deal gives its customers a complimentary Prize Draw ticket where they can win a luxury prize.
questionTwo: I’m new to Deal4Deal, how does it work?
answerTwo: Our website/App features a full tutorial. You can access this tutorial at any time by clicking
answerThree: Deal4Deal is available on desktop, smart phone, tablet and via our interactive kiosks
questionFour: Is Deal4Deal available on Android and IOS?
answerFour: Yes. Deal4Deal is available on both App Store and Google Play Store.
answerFive: Deal4Deal HQ is situated in Dubai. Outlet stores will be coming soon to the region, in the meantime, if you have any inquiries please go to our
questionSix: What countries does Deal4Deal operate in?
answerSix: Deal4Deal is accessible globally. For full details on product/prize collection for international users, please see our
question7: Why should I register an account with Deal4Deal?
answer7: To complete a purchase with Deal4Deal you must have a registered account. This is for your security and protection.
question8: How do I set up my Deal4Deal account?
answer8: To create an account simply click ‘Login/Register’ in the top right hand corner of your screen and enter your details in the fields highlighted.
question9: How do I edit my Deal4Deal account?
answer9: To edit your account, click on your name/photo icon located in the main menu. Tap profile section to edit and click 'Save changes' to complete.
question10: Can I use someone else’s credit card in my Deal4Deal account to complete a purchase?
answer10: If you have the card holder’s permission, you can use/save any credit card to complete your purchase.
question11: How do I ‘Logout’ of my Deal4Deal account?
answer11: To ‘Logout’ simply click on your name/photo in the top right hand corner and select ‘Logout’ from the drop-down menu.
question12: Will I receive ‘push notifications’ if I ‘Logout’?
answer12: You will receive only general notifications when logged out, to receive account related information you must ‘Login’.
question13: I can’t remember my Deal4Deal account password!
answer13: At ‘Login’ select ‘Forgot Password’ and follow the on-screen instructions for password reset.
question14: I want to change my password!
answer14: To change your password, click on your name/photo in the top right hand corner and select ‘My Account’. From here select the ‘Account’ tab to change your password
question15: What Credit Cards does Deal4Deal accept?
answer15: Deal4Deal accepts all major credit/debits cards including (but not limited to): Visa,MasterCard and Amex.
question16: How do I close my Deal4Deal account?
answer16: To close your account you must notify us in writing (from your registered email account) at:
completeaAnswer16: Hereafter, a dedicated member of our support team will assist you within 48 hrs.
question17: Why am I receiving ‘push notifications’/emails from Deal4Deal?
answer17: Deal4Deal is not in the business of spamming or bombarding its users with irrelevant ‘push notifications’/emails. Any notices sent by Deal4Deal have been deemed relevant to your user experience.
campaginQuestion1: How frequently do new Deal4Deal campaigns emerge?
campaginAnswer1: New campaigns are created instantly at the close of an existing campaign. There is no set time limit per campaign, however, you can expect new campaigns to emerge frequently.
campaginAnswer2: New products and prizes are on their way, stay tuned for some exciting campaigns.
purchaseQuestion1: Are there any hidden charges I should be aware of?
purchaseAnswer1: There are no hidden charges on any Deal4Deal purchase. You should however CHECK with your bank to see if they apply any transaction/processing fees.
purchaseAnswer2: Yes! As of January 1st, 2018 all purchases will incur 5% VAT.
purchaseQuestion3: What currencies can I use to purchase an Deal4Deal product?
purchaseAnswer3: Deal4Deal currently only accepts Dirhams and US Dollars. You can make a purchase from Deal4Deal via any bank account with any currency - however, Deal4Deal will not accept responsibility for final billings which have been affected by exchange rates or fees (hidden or otherwise) as imposed by your branch.
purchaseQuestion4: Can I cancel/refund an Deal4Deal purchase order?
lastPurchaseAnswer4: all sales purchases are final and no refunds are given under any circumstances.
purchaseAnswer5: Payment via instalments is a feature we will be adding very soon, please stay tuned for updates.
proQustion1: Where can I collect my Deal4Deal products?
proAnswer1: All Deal4Deal products can be collected directly from Deal4Deal HQ, please read the
proQustion2: Can I send someone else to collect my Deal4Deal products?
proAnswer2: Only the registered account holder, or (and at our discretion), any individual with ‘Power of Attorney’ (POA) can collect the registered account holders’ Deal4Deal purchase. Emirates ID or passport are the only acceptable forms of identification (please ensure your identification is up to date).
dreamAnswer1: You will receive Dream Points with every purchase, these can be collected and used to make purchases.
dreamQuestion2: How can I earn more Dream Points?
dreamAnswer2: You can increase the number of Dream Points you earn on every purchase by improving your tier status.
dreamQuestion4: Can I combine Dream Points with cash?
dreamAnswer4: Yes, Dream Points can be combined with cash to complete a purchase. This feature is only available when you have insufficient points to complete a transaction
dreamAnswer5: Currently it is not possible to purchase Dream Points.
levelAnswer1: Deal4Deal uses membership levels to keep track of and reward its customers.
levelQuestion2: What are the benefits of membership levels?
levelAnswer2: The higher your level status, the greater the amount of i-Points you can earn on every purchase, for example, if you reach VIP status, you will receive 20 i-Points with every USD 27.22 spent.
levelQuestion3: How many levels do you have?
levelAnswer3: There are four levels within Deal4Deal: New member, Advanced, Premium and VIP.
levelQuestion4: How can I get promoted to a higher level?
levelAnswer4: Promotions to higher levels occur through transactions. The more i-Points you accrue, the higher you climb. Promotions to new levels occur automatically and instantly.
levelQuestion5: How do I maintain my level status?
levelAnswer5: All i-Points are valid for a trailing 12-month period. If you do not spend enough from the date of level acquisition (across a 12-month period) your level status will be recalculated and adjusted to reflect this.
donateAnswer1: Deal4Deal rewards every donation by doubling your ticket entry into the Prize Draw. For example, if your ticket serial number is 0000001, then a duplicate ticket with serial number 0000001 will be placed into the draw.
donateQuestion2: How do I know my Deal4Deal products are going to charity?
donateAnswer2: Deal4Deal proudly announces all charity handovers across its various social media channels
referQuestion1: What is the refer a friend programme?
referAnswer1: The refer a friend programme is designed to reward. Every time you refer a friend to Deal4Deal using the invitation code generated by the app, you will be rewarded with USD ليس رقمًا orth of i-Points once they make their first transaction.
referQuestion2: I was referred by a friend, will I be rewarded by the refer a friend programme?
referAnswer2: Yes, once you have successfully registered with Deal4Deal, USD orth of i-Points will be added to your account.
inquirieAnswer1: For job vacancy inquiries, please click ‘Help Centre’ in the Main Menu and select ‘Inquiries’ from the list.
inquirieAnswer2: If you have any inquiries related to any aspect of your Deal4Deal experience, please open the Main Menu and select ‘Help Centre’ from the list. From here you can select to phone/email us with any questions you may have.
securityQuestion1: Are my personal details secure with Deal4Deal?
securityAnswer1: Deal4Deal does not store nor save any sensitive Credit Card information on its servers. Credit Card details that are registered with us are stored securely through the ‘Checkout’ secure online payment gateway
securityQuestion2: Will I be spammed by Deal4Deal?
prizeQuestion1: Where can I collect my Deal4Deal prize?
prizeAnswer1: Details on where to collect your prize will be sent to you (aka the 'winner') via email. For full details please refer to the
prizeQuestion2: Can I send someone else to collect my Prize?
prizeAnswer2: Only the registered account holder, or (and at our discretion), any individual with ‘Power of Attorney’ (POA) can collect the registered account holders’ Deal4Deal Prize. Emirates ID or passport are the only acceptable forms of identification (please ensure your identification is up to date).
prizeQuestion3: What if I don’t want people to know I’ve won the Deal4Deal prize draw?
completePrizeAnswer3: Deal4Deal has the right to use your image, name and any statements made across their marketing channels (physical/digital).
prizeQuestion4: Can I view past winners of the Deal4Deal campaign draws?
prizeAnswer4: You will be able to view past winners of Deal4Deal campaigns via our social media channels, as well as our up and coming 'news' segment
prizeQuestion5: How will I be notified about the status of the campaign: 'Coming Soon'/'Launched'/'Ending'/'Closed'.?
prizeAnswer5: Deal4Deal will send ‘Push Notifications’/emails to notify all ticket holders as to the status of each campaign
